ctx: intros c P1 P2 Q1 Q2 H1 H2 s_pre ms_post Hpre Hacc.

original: intros c P1 P2 Q1 Q2 H1 H2 s_pre ms_post Hpre Hacc. unfold triple_partial_valid in *. intros s Hpre'. destruct (Hacc s Hpre') as [ms [Hacc' Happ]]. destruct ms. - apply H1 with (s_pre := s_pre) (ms_post := Terminating r) in Hpre. + destruct Hpre as [Hpre1 Hpre2]. split. * apply Hpre1. * apply Happ. + apply Hacc'. - apply H2 with (s_pre := s_pre) (ms_post := NonTerminating) in Hpre. + destruct Hpre as [Hpre1 Hpre2]. split. * apply Hpre1. * apply Happ. + apply Hacc'.
